structure.unit: STATE UNIVERSITIES AND COLLEGES -- REGIONAL EDUCATION -- ARCHAEOLOGY

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 214, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 12, sec. 43, effective June 25, 2009. -- Repealed and reenacted 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 172, sec. 2, effective June 24, 2003. -- Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 259, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1998.
